textPlain: On the website, there was a link to a game: https://www.familiars.ioI spent an hour playing it! It is quite good.Is there a source code available for this game?
femboy.cat with a casual 0.2% of the internet
Heng Lu at it again it seems.
Somebody is obviously monopolizing ipv4 space.
(2022)Also, submission title “Welcome to the IPv4 Games” is altered; the original title is “IPv4 Turf War”.Previously: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32790429
